# An R workflow for the Global Nutrition Report datasets

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository is a [`docker`](https://www.docker.com/get-started)-containerised, [`{targets}`](https://docs.ropensci.org/targets/)-based, [`{renv}`](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/articles/renv.html)-enabled [`R`](https://cran.r-project.org/) workflow for downloading, processing, analysing, and visualising the [Global Nutrition Report](https://globalnutritionreport.org) datasets.
